subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Terry Caulley set a Big East record with a 98-yard touchdown run and Larry Taylor returned a punt 72 yards for another score as host Connecticut defeated Army, 21-7.
snippet: Terry Caulley set a Big East record with a 98-yard touchdown run and Larry Taylor returned a punt 72 yards for another score as host Connecticut defeated Army, 21-7.
